task.title: 090 (Locally Assigned LC-Type Call Number)
task.shortdesc: Classification or call number that is taken from Library of Congress Classification or LC Classification Additions and Changes.

context.codeblock: --- examples: # Voyager BIB IDs for testing - [4, 4824458, 907498, 15589961] input: - 090$a trim: - punctuation - whitespace strip: - punctuation - preserve: - period

substep.cmd: Remove any punctuation characters that are not a period (.).
